links.title: Daily Market Research Report-Market continues downward
links.description: STA Research: The market today was again in the red, but well off the lows, on the back of Trump's tweet's ascertaining his desire for a trade war, insinuating the USA can win. Renewed concern over fed rates are starting to simmer down as investors digest it.

links.description: SPY 269.08 - $QQQ 165.99 - $VIX 19.59 The closing quotes don't tell the whole tale today. After opening deep in the red on tariff concerns and hitting a low of 264.82, the $SPY took most of the morning to do some work at lower levels even while the $IWM turned positive.
